item.title: Hollywood Flashback: ‘SNL’’s Epic Emmy Run Began 50 Years Ago
item.description: Lorne Michaels and company might not have been ready for primetime when the sketch show launched on NBC in 1975, but that didn’t stop the TV Academy from handing them four Emmys for the first season.
